content.question: Fra Filippo Lippiâ€™s Madonna and Child with Two Angels exemplifies stylistic aspects linked to the Italian Renaissance through its

choices.label: incorporation of a landscape modeled on ancient frescoes
emphasis on strong shadows and the frontality of the subjects
emphasis on angular forms and hierarchical composition
naturalistic rendering of the holy subjects

content.answer: naturalistic rendering of the holy subjects

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
